most_active_tickets.title: Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Extension Bugs
common_issues.description: Users report various bugs including Pieces desktop app showing empty messages, Chrome extension issues with Stack Overflow, and LTM-2 secret message example not working. Solutions varied from restarting the app to waiting for a patch fix. Issues are acknowledged and being addressed by the Pieces team.

related_issues.title: Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
related_issues.text:
Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
### Checked for Existing Issues?

Desktop Application, Web Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

It fills this text endlessly...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b5edb10-b7cf-4fa6-a523-aa73af94cbee)
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Key Points:**

* luceat-lux-vestra reported an issue with embed buttons not working on a specific page.
* The Pieces support bot acknowledged the issue and routed it to the relevant team member.
* rutvik-at-pieces requested additional information to debug the issue, including PWE version and embed button status.
* luceat-lux-vestra provided the requested information: PWE version 4.0.4 and embed buttons enabled (green dot).

**Problems Identified:**

* Embed buttons were not working on a specific page.
* This issue may be related to embed buttons being enabled on the page.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* rutvik-at-pieces requested additional information to investigate the issue further.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is still under investigation.
* rutvik-at-pieces will provide an update once they have more information.

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue was previously fixed by blacklisting the page to prevent embed buttons from appearing.
* This suggests that the issue may be specific to this particular page.

When copy paste code sencond time in Ask anything give error  this message is empty please try again
## GitHub Issue Summary: Pieces Desktop "Empty Message" Error

**Key Points Raised:**

* Users on all platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux) are experiencing an error where the "Pieces Desktop" message field is empty and they are unable to send messages.
* The issue started after updating to the latest version of the app.

**Problems Identified:**

* A bug in the latest update is preventing users from sending messages.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The Pieces team created a patch release to fix the bug.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The patch release has been deployed and the issue is resolved. Users can now send messages without encountering the "empty message" error. 

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue was acknowledged and addressed promptly by the Pieces team.
* The patch release was effective in resolving the problem.

related_issues.title: "Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly

"Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When using LTM-2 to test the secret message example:
https://pieces.app/magic-moments/ltm

I got a strange response from the LLM:
Claude 3.5:
First Try:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1962a3e4-8b02-4d3f-bc8c-4bdd72c80aa6)
2. try: (waited longer on the website)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd71c5c1-d5d5-4449-acd5-e070fb244fa9)

Gemini 2.0 Flash did fail completely:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50735f7a-28a1-4563-b490-e10c271eca23)
## Conversation Summary - Pieces App Issue

**Key Points:**

* Users reported encountering "basic mode due to device constraints" message in PiecesOS, affecting Workstream activity and LTM updates.
* The issue seems to affect M3 Macs specifically.
* Closing and re-opening PiecesOS temporarily resolves the problem.
* The "unknown origin" element in telemetry data might be related to an older PiecesOS version.

**Solutions:**

* Restarting PiecesOS will fix the issue temporarily.
* A permanent fix will be included in the next PiecesOS update.

**Current Status:**

* The issue is acknowledged and being addressed by the Pieces team.
* A permanent fix is expected in the next PiecesOS update.

**Additional Notes:**

* Vector support might not be available on certain devices.

recommendations: **Investigate and resolve Pieces OS and Extension Bugs:** This is the most common issue reported by users, impacting multiple features and platforms. Prioritize resolving the bugs related to empty messages in the desktop app, Chrome extension issues with Stack Overflow, and the non-functional LTM-2 secret message example.
**Improve communication around bug fixes:** Keep users informed about the progress of bug fixes, especially for issues impacting core functionalities like message sending and extension compatibility.

**Gather more detailed information on bug reports:** Encourage users to provide specific details about their operating system, Pieces OS version, and steps to reproduce the issue. This will help in faster diagnosis and resolution.

**Consider platform-specific testing:**  Given the reported issues on both macOS and Windows, dedicate resources for testing across different operating systems to catch platform-specific bugs early on.

**Review and optimize LTM-2 functionality:** The reported issues with the "Secret Message" example suggest potential problems with LTM-2. Conduct thorough testing and optimization to ensure its smooth functioning.
